step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your shoulder more stable.
You're doing well opening your hand wide. Focus on keeping your arm straight overhead.
Excellent fist and muscle tightening while inhaling. Ensure your arm remains extended.
Great job relaxing and opening your hand while exhaling. Keep your arm extended throughout.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and focus on opening your hand wide while exhaling. This helps pump fluid effectively.
